backend/main.mo: Defines a simple actor exposing getDeploymentDomain, returning the slug "valentine-surprise".
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a requirement about displaying a specific uploaded image in OneMoreThingInteraction.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, components, styles, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme overrides.
frontend/index.html: Standard HTML entry point loading the React app with the title "Valentine Surprise".
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component implementing the interactive Valentine flow with reveal states, evasive No button, background audio, and final interaction section.
frontend/src/components/AudioStatusIndic: Displays a dismissible UI alert for audio playback errors.
frontend/src/components/MessageCoverOver: Envelope-style cover component that triggers the message reveal animation when clicked.
frontend/src/components/OneMoreThingInte: Three-step button interaction that ends by showing a custom image and a personalized message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity with query invalidation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, logout, identity state, and stored sessions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base, components, utilities plus custom OKLCH theme variables for light/dark romantic palette and animation utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, sets up React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, and mounts App with global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme with OKLCH color tokens, typography, container queries, animations, and custom fonts/border radii.
project_state.json: Project state describing a romantic Valentine web app, its features, constraints, known issues, and required assets.
